title: 'Snaky Cat' Game Launches With TOWER Token Rewards on Coinbase's Base
description: This riff on the classic Snake game runs on Base and uses the TOWER token, letting players earn crypto as they create longer cat-snakes.

title: Trump Again Blasts CBDCs, Says They Allow Governments to 'Take Your Money’
description: The former president added that central bank digital currencies pose a "dangerous threat to freedom."

title: AI deepfakes fool voters and politicians ahead of 2024 US elections, ‘I thought it was real’
description:
The U.S. appears unprepared for the onslaught of AI-generated imitations, despite years of warnings from think tanks.

Citizens in New Hampshire received an unusual political request over the weekend of Jan. 20-21. Robo-calls featuring what sounded to many like U.S. president Joe Biden’s voice told them not to vote in the Jan. 23 primary. 

The automated messages were apparently generated by an artificial intelligence (AI) deepfake tool with the apparent purpose of meddling in the 2024 presidential election.

Experts believe bad actors have chosen audio fakes over video because consumers tend to be more discerning when it comes to visual fakery. As AI advisor Henry Ajder recently told the Financial Times, “everyone’s used to Photoshop or at least knows it exists.”

Read more

title: 0x launches gasless swaps with Tx Relay API to enhance DeFi trading
description: The Tx Relay API from 0x provides gasless transactions and dynamic gas adjustment for smoother swaps and fewer failed trades.

title: Abra Settles With Texas Regulators; Allows Bulk Withdrawals
description: Crypto lending platform Abra is permitting its investors to withdraw up to $13 million in funds as part of its lawsuit settlement with the Texas State Securities Board (SSB).

title: Polymer Labs Secures $23M in Series A Funding to Enhance Ethereum Interoperability
description: Polymer Labs has successfully secured $23 million in Series A funding, a substantial financial boost aimed at bolstering the development of its innovative Ethereum-based interoperability hub. In this recent funding round, Polymer Labs garnered crucial support from prominent figures in the blockchain investment sector. title: Drift Protocol Introduces Points Reward Program
description: In a notable development for the Solana blockchain ecosystem, Drift Protocol, the leading perpetual futures trading platform on Solana, has introduced an innovative points reward program.  The initiative is set to precede the much-anticipated launch of Drift’s native token. The program, aptly named Drift Points, is designed to incentivize and reward the platform’s users for […]

title: SEC reveals SIM swap attack behind false Bitcoin ETF approval announcement
description: A SIM swap attack on the U.S. SEC's Twitter account led to a false tweet about Bitcoin ETF approval, briefly disrupting the cryptocurrency market.

title: XRP Shows Signs of Rebound as Gemini Announces Perpetual Contracts
description:
In a challenging month for XRP that saw it dropping to around the $0.5 mark, the cryptocurrency now shows signs of a potential rebound. Ali Martinez, a crypto analyst, has highlighted factors suggesting a short-term recovery for XRP.
